mapper.select: SELECT B.M_ID -- 회원아이디 ,B.B_SUBJECT -- 게시물 ,B.B_REPORTNUM -- 신고횟수 ,R.RP_SEQ -- 신고SEQ ,B.B_SEQ -- 게시글SEQ ,ROWNUM FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN REPORT R ON B.B_SEQ = R.B_SEQ WHERE 1=1
SELECT RE.M_ID -- 회원아이디 ,RE.RE_CONTENT -- 댓글내용 ,RE.RE_REPORTNUM -- 신고횟수 ,R.RP_SEQ -- 신고SEQ ,RE.RE_SEQ -- 댓글SEQ ,ROWNUM FROM REPLY RE INNER JOIN REPORT R ON RE.RE_SEQ = R.RE_SEQ WHERE 1=1

SELECT RD.M_ID -- 회원아이디 ,RD.RD_CONTENT -- 신고사유 ,ROWNUM ,TO_CHAR(RD.RD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RD_DATE -- 신고일자 FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN REPORT R ON B.B_SEQ = R.B_SEQ INNER JOIN REPORTDETAIL RD ON R.RP_SEQ = RD.RP_SEQ WHERE R.RP_SEQ = #{rpSeq}

SELECT RD.M_ID -- 회원아이디 ,RD.RD_CONTENT -- 신고사유 ,ROWNUM ,TO_CHAR(RD.RD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RD_DATE -- 신고일자 FROM REPLY RE INNER JOIN REPORT R ON RE.RE_SEQ = R.RE_SEQ INNER JOIN REPORTDETAIL RD ON R.RP_SEQ = RD.RP_SEQ WHERE R.RP_SEQ = #{rpSeq}
